EmailTemplate.name: Missing Ex Report email to examiner
EmailTemplate.subject: Missing Ex Report email to examiner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your comments on Student’s thesis.
In order to process your report, we require a completed Examiner Report Form which I have attached for your convenience.
Once you have completed this report form, please return to us for processing.
Many thanks,
_______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
